1   package org.lindbergframework.validation.impl;
2   
3   import org.lindbergframework.exception.ValidationException;
4   import org.lindbergframework.validation.IDocumentValidation;
5   import org.lindbergframework.validation.Types;
6   import org.springframework.context.annotation.Scope;
7   import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
8   
9   
10  /**
11   * ImplementaÃ§Ã£oo da validaÃ§Ã£o de CPF
12   * 
13   * @author Victor Lindberg
14   *
15   */
16  @Component(Types.CPF)
17  @Scope("prototype")
18  public class CpfValidation implements IDocumentValidation<String>{
19  	
20  	public CpfValidation(){
21  		//
22  	}
23      
24  	public void validate(String cpf) throws ValidationException {
25  	       if (cpf != null && ! validateCPF(cpf))
26  	    	   throw new ValidationException("CPF invÃ¡lido");
27  	}
28  	
29  	/**
30  	 * Efetua a verificaÃ§Ã£o de o nÃºmero passado como argumento corresponde a um cpf valido
31  	 */
32  	private static String calcDigVerif(String num) {   
33          Integer primDig, segDig;   
34          int soma = 0, peso = 10;   
35          for (int i = 0; i < num.length(); i++)   
36                  soma += Integer.parseInt(num.substring(i, i + 1)) * peso--;   
37    
38          if (soma % 11 == 0 | soma % 11 == 1)   
39              primDig = new Integer(0);   
40          else  
41              primDig = new Integer(11 - (soma % 11));   
42    
43          soma = 0;   
44          peso = 11;   
45          for (int i = 0; i < num.length(); i++)   
46                  soma += Integer.parseInt(num.substring(i, i + 1)) * peso--;   
47             
48          soma += primDig.intValue() * 2;   
49          if (soma % 11 == 0 | soma % 11 == 1)   
50              segDig = new Integer(0);   
51          else  
52              segDig = new Integer(11 - (soma % 11));   
53    
54          return primDig.toString() + segDig.toString();   
55      }   
56    
57      public boolean validateCPF(String cpf) {   
58          if (cpf.length() != 11 || equalAllNumbers(cpf))   
59              return false;   
60    
61          String numDig = cpf.substring(0, 9);   
62          return calcDigVerif(numDig).equals(cpf.substring(9, 11));   
63      }
64      
65      private boolean equalAllNumbers(String cpf){
66      	int countTokens = cpf.split(cpf.substring(0, 1)).length;
67      	
68      	return countTokens == 0;
69      }
70      
71  }
